item.title: By: Ryan Brazell
item.dc:creator: Ryan Brazell
item.description:
Glad to have you back in the Library, Steve!
For anyone who is interested, I wil be hosting a "Welcome Back Steve" happy hour at Social Kitchen and Brewery this Friday, October 5th, from 5:30-7pm. Social is located on 9th between Judah and Irving, just across from Arizmendi Bakery. Come join us!
item.content:encoded:
Glad to have you back in the Library, Steve!

For anyone who is interested, I wil be hosting a “Welcome Back Steve” happy hour at Social Kitchen and Brewery this Friday, October 5th, from 5:30-7pm. Social is located on 9th between Judah and Irving, just across from Arizmendi Bakery. Come join us!

item.title: By: Richard Trott
item.dc:creator: Richard Trott
item.content:encoded:
“Your dreams were your ticket out…”

Also: #OccupyCKM

Good to have you back, Steve!
